titles.title: Calling upon Muammar Qaddafi to immediately release United States citizens detained in Libya.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, and Human Rights.

committee.subcommittee: Africa, Global Health, and Human Rights
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary:
5/23/2011--Introduced. Calls upon Muammar Qaddafi to immediately release U.S. citizens detained in Libya and urges the National Transitional Council to search for and secure their release.
Encourages the Department of State to request help locating any U.S. citizens who are missing in Libya from other nations who maintain a diplomatic presence in Libya.
